    Methods in main with parameters of type Rider
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Train.addPassenger(Rider r)
    adds a passenger to the Train as long as (i) the Rider is at the correct Station to enter the Train, (ii) the Train is going in the appropriate direction, and (iii) there is space on the Train.
    void
    Railway.addRider(Rider r)
    – (i) sets a Rider’s direction based on the order of the Stations in the Railway and (ii) adds the Rider to the appropriate Station in the Railway.
    boolean
    Station.addRider(Rider r)
    adds a Rider to the appropriate Queue, depending on the Rider’s direction, as long as they should be in this Station.
    void
    Railway.setRiderDirection(Rider r)
    sets a Rider’s direction based on the Rider’s starting and ending Stations.
